name: wb-starter
description: Modern website starter kit powered by WB Behaviors

scripts.test: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors

scripts.test:behaviors: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
scripts.test:all: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
